mapLegend.current: This is the current distribution of {{species}} (chorology)
mapLegend.context: by {{year}}, in most of the currently visible map area
mapLegend.overwhelminglySuitable: {{context}}, {{species}} is likely to become suitable (+{{pct}}% suitable)
mapLegend.mostlyDecolonizedSomewhatSuitable: {{context}}, {{species}} is likely to disappear ({{pct}}% decolonized), while in some areas it might become suitable (+{{pct}}% suitable)
mapLegend.mostlySuitableSomewhatDecolonized: {{context}}, {{species}} is likely to become suitable (+{{pct}}% suitable), while in some areas it might disappear ({{pct}}% decolonized)
mapLegend.mostlyStableSomewhatDecolonized: {{context}}, {{species}} is stable ({{pct}}% stable), but in some areas it might disappear (+{{pct}}% suitable)
mapLegend.mostlyStableSomewhatSuitable: {{context}}, {{species}} is stable ({{pct}}% stable), and in some areas it might become suitable (+{{pct}}% suitable)
mapLegend.bothDecolonizedAndSuitable: {{context}}, {{species}} is somewhat equally likely to disappear ({{pct}}% decolonized) and likely to become suitable (+{{pct}}% suitable)
mapLegend.bothStableAndSuitable: {{context}}, {{species}} is somewhat equally stable ({{pct}}% stable) and likely to become suitable (+{{pct}}% suitable)
mapLegend.bothStableAndDecolonized: {{context}}, {{species}} is somewhat equally stable ({{pct}}% stable) and likely to disappear ({{pct}}% decolonized)
mapLegend.equal: {{context}}, {{species}} is somewhat equally stable ({{pct}}% stable), likely to disappear ({{pct}}% decolonized) and likely to become suitable (+{{pct}}% suitable)
